parameters: "Ich mach dann mal Abendessen. In der
Zwischenzeit, fühl dich wie zu Hause."
"Anyway, why don't I start preparing dinner
you go ahead and make yourself at home?"
you go ahead and make yourself
you go ahead and make yourself
If you opened up this door, you could go.
It would be very easy to leave.
Is all of this even worth it?
You wonder if it's too late to go.
You don't turn around as you leave Fios home behind.
There are many questions left unanswered and your
conscience is eating you up, knowing you abandoned
You can start over, live a normal life and...
...did you really think it would be that easy?

But you do not have a choice.

Fio is nowhere to be found.
You decide to head back to bed.
